titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the full exclusion applicable to qualified small business stock.
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the full exclusion applicable to qualified small business stock.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the 100% exclusion from gross income of gain from the sale or exchange of qualified small business stock held for more than 5 years.
